description: A Korean meal featuring rice, chicken, and vegetables offers a harmonious blend of flavors, often seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and sesame oil. Served as a stir-fry or in a bibimbap style, it's a vibrant, wholesome dish with a balance of savory and fresh notes.

Indulge in Chef André's signature Charcoal-Seared Ribeye, a masterpiece of culinary art. This prime cut of aged beef is marinated with a delicate blend of garlic, rosemary, and cracked black pepper, then seared over an open flame to achieve a perfect crust. Cooked to your desired doneness, the steak is served with a drizzle of smoky bourbon glaze and a side of roasted garlic mashed potatoes. Each bite promises a symphony of flavor—succulent, tender, and irresistibly savory.

A Korean meal featuring rice, chicken, and vegetables offers a harmonious blend of flavors, often seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and sesame oil. Served as a stir-fry or in a bibimbap style, it's a vibrant, wholesome dish with a balance of savory and fresh notes.
